message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you my [Product Name] at a price that I believe is fair and represents exceptional value.  While I value this product at no less than $1,000,000, I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,250,000. This price point allows for a significant gain for you while still ensuring I receive a fair return on my investment.  Please consider this offer carefully.  I'm confident you'll recognize the exceptional value proposition.
